settings.first-line: Welcome To Cliphair Redhead Campaign > Redefining Red

settings.description: Join us in a colourful journey where red is more than just a colour – it's a bold statement of strength and uniqueness. This year, Cliphair isn’t just presenting red; we’re giving it a whole new meaning. Our #RedefiningRed campaign is here to inspire and empower all redheads. Whether you are a natural redhead, a redhead by choice, or simply an admirer of the colour, you've found your space here.

settings.section_title: Exciting News: A New Gorgeous Red Shade Is Here!
settings.description: You asked, we listened! We are thrilled to announce the introduction of not just one, but TWO new fiery shades of red, each taking unique twists on our existing red shades ensuring that every redhead can find their perfect match!

One salon, one restaurant, and a wave of redheads filling the place with a zesty, sophisticated vibe. Does it sound too good to be true? No, it’s just the start of our annual redhead campaign: It’s A Redhead Thing. Opening with an exclusive red-only event, the Cliphair team invited an extraordinary selection of red-haired beauties,
settings.read_more: influencers, and hair enthusiasts to gather and network, celebrate red hair’s unique beauty, and share stories over tasty canapes and a few drinks – all of this after showcasing the power of our gorgeous red hair extensions collection with complimentary makeovers offered by some of our partner hair stylists. Cherry on top? The highly anticipated reveal of our new red shade: Cowgirl Copper.

settings.header: Exciting News: A New Gorgeous Red Shade Is Here!
settings.intro: You asked, we listened! We are thrilled to announce the introduction of a new fiery shade of red, taking a unique twist on our existing red shades. Let us introduce you to: Cowgirl Copper!

custom_css: .section-btn {color: #ffffff !important; background: #c26539; border-radius: 30px; margin: 0; line-height: 1.2em; text-align: center; cursor: pointer; padding: 10px 30px;}

settings.intro: Named after the viral red hair trend of 2023, this vibrant shade is characterised by a fiery, bright copper undertone illuminating a sultry, rich, dark auburn hue. The ideal choice for a trendy redhead that isn’t afraid of standing out and would like to add dimension and character to their mane.

settings.title: A subtle & delicate mix
settings.description: A subtle & delicate mix between a brighter natural red & light auburn, designed to give red hair bounce and movement - without going high-contrast. Perfect for adding a natural glow to ginger tresses.

settings.title: A vibrant, highlighted look
settings.description: A vibrant, highlighted look characterised by a fiery, bright red streaking a background of natural dark auburn. The ideal choice for a redhead that isn’t afraid of standing out and would like to add dimension and character to their mane.

settings.title:
KNOW
YOUR TONE
settings.description: Warm, cool, neutral: here's how to find your skin undertone, and which of our reds would suit you better based on your natural palette.

settings.title:
HAVE I SEEN
YOU SOMEWHERE?
settings.description: Which famous redhead are you? A fun personality test to find your red-haired movie twin!

settings.title:
LET'S TALK
AESTHETICS
settings.description: Tell me what your aesthetic is, and I'll find your red... Classy, edgy, bohemian, trendy: find your perfect red today!

settings.sub_header:
Soft and creamy.

Hot and spicy. Sultry and vibrant.
settings.intro: We're about to paint the town red. Are you with us? Whether your red is punchy and rebellious, delicate and natural, or zesty as it can be - we will bring it to life with the best 100% Remy hair extensions in our range.

What does being a redhead mean to you?

Who is your ULTIMATE redhead icon of all times? What hairstyle that brings your hair to life?

Heres what our fabulous redheads have to say!
